title: Mills Publishes Journal Article on Rubric Assessment (Belmont University)
text: ( Source : Belmont University ) Coordinator of Research Services in Bunch Library and Associate Professor Jenny Mills co-authored an article, ' Project RAILS: Lessons Learned about Rubric Assessment of Information Literacy Skills,' with
